title: Fibonacci Function
description: This function calculates the Fibonacci number for a given integer input X. The function returns -1 for any input less than 0 or greater than 46. For inputs between 0 and 46, it computes the Fibonacci number using an iterative method. If the input is less than 2, it returns the input value directly.
name: FIB

input.name: X
input.description: An integer input for which the Fibonacci number needs to be calculated.

output.name: FIB
output.description: The calculated Fibonacci number, or -1 for invalid input.

return_value.description: The final result of the Fibonacci calculation.
